namespace.name: mathutil
namespace.doc: This provides some useful conversion (mm to inches, celcius to kelvin, etc), mathematical constants, and basic mathematical functions for convenience.

variable.name: ABSOLUTE_ZERO_CELCIUS
variable.brief: It is impossible for any temperature to be < this value, in Celcius

functiontemplate.name: CtoK
functiontemplate.brief: Convert from Celcius temperature to Kelvin

functiontemplate.name: KtoC
functiontemplate.brief: Convert from Kelvin temperature to Celcius

variable.name: MM_PER_IN
variable.brief: By definition, there are EXACTLY 25.4 mm per inch.
